Client Registration Documentation Or Anti Money Laundering Compliance [Member]
Client registration documentation /Anti Money Laundering compliance [Member]
Client Registration Documents Executed And Supporting Collected [Member]
All relevant Client Registration Documents executed with clients in compliance with SEBI circulars and supporting collected from the clients are available and are easily retrievable. [Member]
UCC allotted [Member]
UCC is allotted to all the clients registered during the audit period & the same is timely uploaded to the Exchange. [Member]
No clauses [Member]

No clauses are included in any of the documents executed with the clients- a) which dilutes responsibility of member or b) which is in conflict with any of the clauses in mandatory documents Rules Bye-laws Regulations Notices Guidelines & Circulars issued by SEBI & Exchanges or c) Which is not in the interest of the Investor? [Member]
mandatory clauses [Member]

All the mandatory clauses/documents and Annexures such as KYC details relating to trading account rights and Obligation Dos and Don’ts RDD and Tariff sheet and contact details of senior officials and Investor Grievance Cell of the member as stipulated by SEBI/Exchanges have been included in the mandatory section of the Account opening kit executed with the clients. [Member]
verification is done by employee or authorised person [Member]

In-person verification is done by Employee or Authorised Person only and the date of verification name designation and signature of the official who has done in-person verification and the Rubber Stamp is incorporated in the client registration form.In case in-person verification of non-resident clients is not done attestation of KYC documents is done by Notary Public Court Magistrate Judge Local Banker Indian Embassy/ Consulate General in the country where the client resides. [Member]
any changes from the respective client [Member]
Any changes in address bank account or demat account is carried out on receipt of written request along with documentary proof from the respective client [Member]
financial information provided by the client [Member]
Trading member has taken documentary evidence in support of financial information provided by the client for equity derivatives segment. [Member]
financial details are reviewed periodically and updated [Member]
Client details including financial details are reviewed periodically and updated for clients in compliance with Exchange circulars. [Member]
trading code and the unique client code allotted for ECN [Member]

Trading code and the unique client code allotted to a client and the e-mail furnished by the client for the purpose of receiving ECN and other details are communicated by the trading member through the client account opening form or otherwise in writing to the client. [Member]
member has identified as per SEBI circular CIRMIRSD22013 [Member]

Member has identified the beneficial owners of the client ( non-individuals) and has taken reasonable measures to verify the identity of such person as per SEBI Circular CIR/MIRSD/2/2013 dated January 24 2013 [Member]
member placing orders on behalf of the client [Member]
Member has a process to identify the authority of the person who is placing orders on behalf of the client. [Member]
risk profiling of the clients as per the PMLA master [Member]
Risk profiling of the clients has been done as per the written down policy of the trading member as per the PMLA master circular. [Member]
member has adopted sufficient due diligence process as per the PMLA master [Member]
Member has adopted sufficient due diligence process for clients according to their risk profile as per the PMLA master circular. [Member]
not opened account where the member is unable to apply due diligence measures or KYC policies [Member]

Member is having a clearly defined policy for acceptance of clients and has ensured that an account is not opened where the member is unable to apply appropriate client due diligence measures/KYC Policies. [Member]
clients of special category as per the PMLA master [Member]
Member has identified clients of special category (CSC) as per the PMLA master circular. [Member]
the client has opted and signed against stock exchange as well as market segment [Member]
The Client has opted and signed against stock exchange as well as market segment where he intends to trade/traded during the year. [Member]
copies of complete set of client registration documents including POA was delivered [Member]
Copies of complete set of client registration documents including POA executed by the client was delivered to the client free of charge and within 7 days of upload of UCC. [Member]
authorizations from the client sought in non mandatory document [Member]
Authorizations from the client sought in non-mandatory document are separate & do have client’s specific consent. [Member]
set of standard documents or policies on their own website [Member]
Trading members had displayed the set of standard documents/policies on their own website for information. [Member]
correctly uploaded data in UCC database as per the client registration documents [Member]

The member has correctly uploaded and updated the E mail ID and the Mobile number of the clients in the UCC database as per the details given by the client in the client registration documents. [Member]
correctly uploaded data in the exchange UCC records and in the members back office records [Member]

The member has correctly uploaded and updated the same E mail ID & the Mobile number of the client in the Exchange UCC records and in the Member’s back office records and there are no variations. [Member]
member having websites to update their E mail IDs and mobile numbers [Member]
Member having websites have prominently displayed a message on their websites informing their clients to update their E mail IDs & Mobile numbers with the member. [Member]
complied KYC information with registered KRAs as per MIRSDCIR262011 And MIRSDCIR52012 [Member]

Member has complied with the requirement of uploading the KYC information with the SEBI registered KRAs for all the clients on a continuous basis within the prescribed time limit as per SEBI circular MIRSD/Cir-26/2011 dated December 23 2011 and MIRSD/Cir-5/2012 dated April 13 2013 and complied with the provisions of the Circular. [Member]
downloaded KYC information from KRA system [Member]
Member has downloaded KYC information from KRA system for new clients who are already registered with KRA [Member]
uploaded the KYC data with CKYCR for all individual accounts opened [Member]
Member has uploaded the KYC data with CKYCR in respect of all individual accounts opened during the Audit period. [Member]
uploaded the KYC data with CKYCR for all existing individual accounts opened [Member]
Member has uploaded the KYC data with CKYCR in respect of all existing individual accounts (i.e. accounts opened prior to the Audit period). [Member]
member has displayed name address REG number and logo on account opening kits ETC [Member]

Trading Member has prominently displayed on account opening kits Website Advertisement publication notice board and display board portal website (if any) the following details- i) name of the member as registered with SEBI ii) its own logo if any iii) its registration number iv) its complete address with telephone numbers. [Member]
member has made available the documents either in electronic or physical mode [Member]

Member has made available the documents relating to rights & obligations uniform risk disclosure document dos & dont to the clients either in electronic or physical mode as per the preference of the client. [Member]
member has maintained appropriate logs for electronically sent data [Member]
Member has maintained appropriate logs in case the documents relating to rights & obligations uniform risk disclosure document dos & dont are sent electronically to the clients. [Member]
members have displayed the documents and copy of the same is provided to clients on request [Member]

Members have displayed the documents relating to rights & obligations uniform risk disclosure document do’s & don’t in vernacular languages on their own website (if any) and copy of the same is provided to clients on request. [Member]
member has not uploaded same E mail ID and mobile numbers to multiple clients except for family [Member]
Member has not uploaded same E mail ID and Mobile numbers to multiple clients except for family as defined by SEBI circular CIR/MIRSD/15/2011 dated August 02 2011. [Member]
client registered through online KYC processas per circular SEBIHOMIRSDDOPCIRP202073 [Member]

For client registered through online KYC process member has adhered to all applicable guidelines which facilitate online KYC in accordance with SEBI Circular no. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/DOP/CIR/P/2020/73 dated April 242020 [Member]
order management and risk management systems [Member]
Order management and risk management systems [Member]
member has well documented risk management policy including policy on margin collection from clients [Member]
Trading member has well documented risk management policy including policy on Margin collection from clients/Trading members. [Member]
irregularity or false reporting is observed even if sound system available for collecting and reporting [Member]

Member has a sound system for collecting and reporting client margin & MTM to the Exchange as per the Exchange/Clearing Corporation requirement. In case of any irregularity observed mention in remarks the instances where false reporting is observed. [Member]
member has not funded its clients in contravention to exchange or SEBI requirement except margin trading guidelines [Member]

Member has not funded its clients in contravention to Exchange/SEBI requirement except in accordance to the Margin trading guidelines. (Exchange notice no. 20150515-1 dated May 15 2015 and 20151029-34 dated October 29 2015 SEBI circular CIR/MRD/DP/54/2017 dated June 13 2017 CIR/MRD/DP/86/2017 dated August 1 2017 and CIR/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD2/CIR/P/2017/64 dated June 22 2017). [Member]
member has correctly reported details of client funding to the exchange [Member]
Member has correctly reported details of client funding if any to the exchange. [Member]
trading member has not undertaken any fund based activity to fund any secondary market transactions [Member]

Trading member has not undertaken or was not party to or has not facilitated any fund based activity to fund any secondary market transactions or margin requirements in respect of transactions executed by the trading members on behalf of their clients through financier including any associate related or third party entities. [Member]
checks are in place to ensure that no unauthorized orders are executed [Member]
Checks are in place to ensure that no unauthorized orders are executed from any of the terminals. [Member]
if dormant account is reactivated then to ensure that account is operated by the relevant client [Member]
In case of dormant accounts if the account is reactivated then there are checks in place to ensure that account is operated by the relevant client only. [Member]
initial and other margins or MTM are collected from respective clients [Member]

Initial and other margins/MTM are collected from respective clients in the prescribed form of funds fixed deposit receipts bank guarantees and approved/liquid securities with appropriate haircut. [Member]
proper systems are in place to ensure settlement schedule [Member]
Proper systems are in place to ensure timely collection for pay-in from the respective client as per settlement schedule. [Member]
proper monitoring mechanism for long outstanding debit balances and recovery [Member]
Proper monitoring mechanism is in place to review long outstanding debit balances in clients account and recovery of the same. [Member]
member has proper internal code of conduct and internal controls with respect to CIRISD12011 and CIRISD22011 [Member]

Trading member has implemented proper internal code of conduct and adequate internal controls to ensure that proper checks and balances are in place with respect to SEBI Circular Cir/ ISD/1/2011 dated March 23 2011 and Cir/ISD/2/2011 dated March 24 2011 on the subject `Unauthenticated news circulated by SEBI registered market intermediaries through various modes of communication. [Member]
trading member has not outsourced their core business activities and compliance functions as per CIRMIRSD242011 [Member]
Trading member has not outsourced their core business activities and compliance functions and adhered to the provisions of SEBI circular CIR/MIRSD/24/2011 dated 15th Dec 2011. [Member]
member not recovered excess amount towards short margin penalty levied in the derivative segment [Member]
The member has not recovered from the clients excess amount towards short margin penalty levied by the Exchange/ Clearing Corporation in the derivative segment. [Member]
member has passed on the short margin penalty to the clients and provided the relevant supporting documents [Member]
In case the member has passed on the short margin penalty to the clients the member has provided the relevant supporting documents to the clients. [Member]
member has surveillance policy as per the exchange notice 2013030721 and 2017011811 [Member]
Member has drafted and implemented Surveillance policy as per the Exchange notice no. 20130307-21 dated March 07 2013 and 20170118-11 dated January 18 2017. [Member]
member has checks for value and or quantity as per cirmrddp342012 [Member]

Member has implemented appropriate checks for value and / or quantity based on the respective risk profile of their clients as per the provisions of SEBI Circular CIR/MRD/DP/34/2012 dated December 13 2012. [Member]
the member has a mechanism to limit the cumulative value of all unexecuted orders with threshold limit set by them as per cirmrddp342012 [Member]

The member has put-in place a mechanism to limit the cumulative value of all unexecuted orders placed from their terminals to below a threshold limit set by them as per the provisions of SEBI Circular CIR/MRD/DP/34/2012 dated December 13 2012. [Member]
member holds more than 1 percent of share capital of a listed company which has disclosed to the exchange as per 2013112920 and 2014021421and 2014031827 [Member]

Where the Member holds more than 1% of share capital of a listed company the same has been disclosed to the Exchange as per Exchange notice no. 20131129-20 dated November 29 2013 20140214-21 dated February 14 2014 and 20140318-27 dated March 18 2014. [Member]
member has taken documentary evidences as per cirmrddp202014 [Member]

Member has taken adequate documentary evidences as specified in SEBI circular CIR/MRD/DP/20/2014 dated June 20 2014 in case of participants taking positions in CD segment in excess of the applicable position limits based on underlying exposure specified in the said circular. [Member]
member has executed trades after keeping evidence and maintained the record as per cirhomirsdmirsd2cirp2017108 and 124 and 201809 [Member]

Member has executed trades of clients only after keeping evidence of the client placing such order and maintained the record of the same in the manner specified by SEBI from time to time. Refer SEBI circular nos. CIR/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD2/CIR/P/2017/108 dated September 26 2017 CIR/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD2/CIR/P/2017/124 dated November 30 2017 and CIR/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD2/CIR/P/2018/09 dated January 11 2018. [Member]
trading member has ensured that any further trading by inactive client in UCC is allowed only after undertaking sufficient due and obtaining KYC as per 2020021047 and 2020120127 [Member]

Trading Member has ensured that any further trading by a client tagged as “inactive” in UCC is allowed only after undertaking sufficient due diligence and obtaining the updated information related to KYC from the concerned client as per Exchange notice no. 20200210-47 dated February 10 2020 and 20201201-27 dated December 1 2020. [Member]
trading member has adhered to the guidelines and framed an internal policy as per 2019122739 and 2020031157 [Member]

Trading Member has adhered to the guidelines laid down in Exchange notice nos. 20191227-39 dated December 27 2019 and 20200311-57 dated March 11 2020 while offering client incentives/referral schemes. Also Trading Member has framed an internal policy w.r.t. quantum/maximum limit on the incentive to be provided to the referring person in compliance with guidelines laid down in Exchange notice nos. 20191227-39 dated December 27 2019 and 20200311-57 dated March 11 2020. Such policy is duly approved by its Board (in case of corporate trading member) Partners (in case of partnership firms) or Proprietor (in case of sole proprietorship firm) as the case may be. Trading Member has taken adequate steps to review and monitor the adherence to the said policy on a regular basis at such intervals not later than one year. [Member]
member has mechanism for physical settlement in stock derivatives 2021021037 [Member]

Member has made available the mechanism for physical settlement in stock derivatives to all their clients who wish to avail of the said facility without having any default option of mandatory/automated squaring off the positions in compliance to Exchange notice no. 20210210-37 dated February 10 2021 [Member]
irregularity or false reporting is observed even if sound system available for collecting and reporting as per SEBIHOMRD2DCAPCIRP2020127 [Member]

Member has a sound system for collecting and reporting client peak margin & MTM to the Exchange as per the Exchange/Clearing Corporation requirement as per SEBI circular SEBI/HO/MRD2/DCAP/CIR/P/2020/127 dated July 20 2020 w.e.f. December 1 2020. In case of any irregularity observed mention in remarks the instances where false reporting is observed. [Member]
proper monitoring mechanism for MTM losses incurred and recovery [Member]
Proper monitoring mechanism is in place to review the client MTM losses incurred and recovery of the same [Member]
proper monitoring mechanism for IT or security related incidents detected and resolution [Member]
Proper monitoring mechanism is in place to review the IT/Security related incidents detected and resolution of the same. [Member]
contract notes and client margin details and statement of accounts [Member]
Contract notes Client margin details and Statement of accounts [Member]
contract notes are sent in the prescribed format and within specified time limit [Member]
Contract notes are sent in the prescribed format and within specified time limit. [Member]
member has issued contract notes only for trades done under the rules and byelaws and regulations of the exchange [Member]
Trading member has issued contract notes only for trades done under the rules byelaws & regulations of the Exchange and not otherwise. [Member]
details including running serial number and name and signature of authorized signatory with dealing office details and brokerage are contained in contract note [Member]
All prescribed details including running serial number name and signature of authorized signatory dealing office details and brokerage are contained in contract note. [Member]
daily margin statement is issued to the respective clients [Member]
Daily Margin statement is issued to the respective clients with the details as specified and within the prescribed time limit. [Member]
proof of delivery of contract notes or statement of accounts or daily margin [Member]
Proof of delivery / dispatch/ log for dispatch of Contract Notes/ Statement of Accounts/ daily margin is maintained. [Member]
member has complied electronic contract notes if the contract notes are sent electronically [Member]
Member has complied with regulatory requirements related to Electronic contract notes (ECN) if the contract notes are sent electronically. [Member]
trail of bounced mails and physical delivery of bounce mails for ecns [Member]
Trail of bounced mails is maintained and physical delivery is ensured in case of bounce mails for ECNs. [Member]
complete statement of accounts for funds and securities with error reporting clause [Member]
Complete statement of accounts for funds and securities are issued on a quarterly basis to clients (wherever applicable) with error reporting clause. [Member]
details regarding appointment of compliance officer and changes [Member]
Details regarding appointment of Compliance Officer and changes there in if any have been informed to the exchange. [Member]
trading member has displayed name and reg number and address and details of compliance officer in revent document [Member]

Trading Member has prominently displayed on contract notes statement of funds and securities correspondences with the clients the following details- i) name of the member as registered with SEBI ii) its own logo if any iii) its registration number iv) its complete address with telephone numbers v) the name of the compliance officer his telephone number and e-mail address. [Member]
